Body: Description: Please advise what the configured IP 111.33.33.111 is used for as seen in the screenshot attached. I need to know if we need to whitelist this IP to allow SMTP settings access to send mail to mimecast
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici, Tumelo Molefe
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici
What We've Learned Updated: Client would like to have a remote session to check up the connectivity of the Mimecast smart host but they need access to the SSH backend.
Next Steps Updated: Scheduled a remote session.

What We've Learned Updated: Went on a remote session with the client and Adrian to discuss the problem.
Seems like they are having issues adjusting the SMTP settings within System Settings->Email Server Settings as they might not have the proper configuration done on the Exchange Side as Adrian mentioned during the meeting.
He sent them an e-mail with instructions on how to configure the settings there and try again after that and let us know how it goes.
Next Steps Updated: Will wait for their response.

What We've Learned Updated: Connected remote along with Adrian to take a look and assist Tumelo.
Connected to the backend and did a ping to the mimecast and office65 host.
Eventually Tumelo took a look at the exchange site and did some tests and he came up with a way to create the connectivity through a relay.
Will follow up with him to let us know if he needs further assistance.
